column5: I use a shoulder bag.  muddler
Started out using a vest, but could never remember what pocket I put stuff in....LOL.  Got a nice chest pack that works great for me.
I carry all of my steelhead stuff in a sewing thimble!
I use a vest now, but i think I'll switch to a chest pack next year.
I know what you mean. I guess I'm not bright enuf to be a flyfisherperson. Too dang many pockets to remember where each little thingy resides.  JF
